alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts, Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 19 at 8:58AM MST until April 19 at 9:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR MOHAVE COUNTY... * AFFECTED AREA...In Arizona...Fire weather zone 102. * TIMING...Until 9 PM PDT/MST today. * WIND...Southwest 20 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum values 5 to 12 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly due to dry fuels, low humidity, and high wind gusts. Outdoor burning is highly discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
